CustomField.description: Identifies if Contract Terms, Incumbent, External Debrief exists and the Sub-Stage is 7.2 T&Cs Signed.
CustomField.formula: AND( Contract_Signed__c = TRUE, Incumbent_Exists__c = TRUE, Contract_Terms_Exist__c = TRUE, External_Debrief_Exists__c = TRUE )
CustomField.label: Commission Eligible
